mainText:
You made America proud to have a son like you; 


You made the world proud to have human being like you,


You have done your own work on earth and in Bayangi tribe in CAMEROON we say 


You will come again!!! 


I Thank God for this 1st phase your beautiful short life on earth.


May your beautiful soul rest in peace until the 2nd phase.


NOW PLEASE KEEP THE JEANS AND turtleneck!!!  


Thanks for everything
header: What a Man!!!!!!! With Infectious Ingenuity
author: Eno
